author: Tab Spurrier

author: Paul Molitor
comment: horrible experience. Convoluted UX (where do i click to search what I just typed? how can there be no results?),  extremely obnoxious about paying (every other button + the overlay taking a third of the playing window opens the in app purchase window), and buggy/crash happy (once froze my watch entirely) I'm not sure what i expected, but this was not it

author: Faby Stolte
comment: I downloaded the app on my Huawei watch and have not been able to watch anything on it. It is so SLOW...When I click on the video it just lags and it never actually plays anything. How do you expect me to buy the full version if I can't even get the free version to work? Please make it better!

reply.author: appfour
reply.content: Thank you for the feedback, if your issue is persisting please consider contacting our support team via support@appfour.com for assistance or refund.

author: Steve Alaimo
comment: Down loaded the free version of the app. I can't even get it to play a video on my moto360 ver 2(running wear2). I pressed play on a random video that came up.
